senses.de: The part of a scene or picture that is farthest from the viewer.
senses.ex: The mountains in the background of the painting gave it depth.

Tips.title: Visual Depth
Tips.description: Use 'background' to describe elements that add depth and layers to a visual scene.
Tips.example: The distant trees created a serene background for the portrait.

Tips.title: Not Center Stage
Tips.description: 'Background' implies something not in the main focus but still contributing to the overall image.
Tips.example: In group photos, shy people often stand in the background.

senses.de: The experiences, knowledge, education, etc., in a person's past.
senses.ex: The job requires a background in computer science.

Tips.title: Personal History
Tips.description: Employers often conduct a 'background check' to verify a candidate's personal and professional history.
Tips.example: Candidates with a diverse cultural background are often valued for their unique perspectives.

Tips.title: Academic Relevance
Tips.description: Relate 'background' to the necessary knowledge or experience needed for a task or job.
Tips.example: She has a strong background in biochemistry, making her ideal for this research.

senses.de: A procedure on a computer that continues to operate after the user has finished working with it.
senses.ex: The program runs in the background while you're working on other tasks.

Tips.title: Technical Processes
Tips.description: In tech, 'background' refers to processes on a computer or device that runs without user interaction.
Tips.example: The software update will download in the background.

senses.de: The conditions that form the setting of an event, fact, or character is created or considered.
senses.ex: The decision was made against a background of declining sales.

Tips.title: Setting Context
Tips.description: Use 'background' to set the scene or explain the circumstances surrounding an event or decision.
Tips.example: The author provided a detailed historical background to the story.

Tips.title: Understanding Motives
Tips.description: A person's actions may be better understood against their personal or cultural background.
Tips.example: His decisions are often influenced by his military background.

senses.de: Quiet music played to provide mood or atmosphere.
senses.ex: I put on some background music while I study.

Tips.title: Atmospheric Ambience
Tips.description: 'Background' music or noise is meant to enhance the environment without being the main focus.
Tips.example: The cafe had soft background jazz playing, adding to the cozy vibe.

Tips.title: Subtle Presence
Tips.description: Background sounds or music should not overpower conversation or the primary action.
Tips.example: The background hum of the air conditioner was barely noticeable.

Context.wordDefinition:
Context refers to the circumstances and conditions surrounding a particular event or situation. It helps us understand what is happening in the present moment and why it is important.

For example, if you are watching a news report about a protest, the context might include details about the history of oppression or discrimination that led to the protest.

Background is about the past and context is about the present. Background helps us understand why someone or something is the way they are, while context helps us understand what is happening right now and why it matters.

Environment.wordDefinition:
Environment refers to the physical, social, and cultural surroundings in which a person, animal, or plant lives.

It includes everything from the air we breathe to the people we interact with. For example, a person's environment may include their home, workplace, and community.

Background refers to an individual's personal history and experiences, whereas environment refers to the external factors that shape their life.

Experience.wordDefinition:
Background refers to a person's history, including their education, family, and cultural upbringing. Experience refers to the knowledge and learning that a person has gained through various activities and events.

Whereas, experience is used to measure a person's skills and competencies in a particular field of work or activity. It is applicable in assessing job readiness or in evaluating an individual's expertise in a certain area.

Background refers to a person's personal history while experience refers to their skills and knowledge gained from activities they have engaged in.

Heritage.wordDefinition:
Heritage refers to a person's cultural or ethnic identity. This includes things like their language, customs, beliefs, and traditions that have been passed down through generations.

While both words refer to different aspects of a person's identity, they can overlap in some cases. For example, a person's heritage may influence their background if they were raised in a household that emphasized their cultural traditions.

Background is applicable to a person's personal history and experiences, while heritage is applicable to a person's cultural and ethnic identity.

History.wordDefinition:
History, on the other hand, refers to the past events, particularly related to a country, person, or group. It involves the recording, narrating, and analyzing of past events or happenings.

For example, the history of the United States can be traced back to the American Revolution.

The background is the information one needs to know about a specific situation or event, whereas history is the record of past events that have occurred over a long period of time.

Past.wordDefinition:
Past refers to the time that has elapsed before the present moment. It includes all of the events, experiences, and actions that have happened in a person's life up until now.

Past is often used to describe a person's personal history or the historical events that have shaped the world.

Background is more about the context in which something occurs, while past is more about the events that have occurred before the present moment.

Set.wordDefinition:
Background refers to the area or environment behind the main focus of a picture, story, or event. It is the setting that helps to create the mood or atmosphere of what is happening.

Set can refer to a collection of objects or scenery used on a stage or movie set to create a specific setting or environment.

It is typically the physical props and decorations that are used to create the background. For example, a movie set might include a fake house or street that creates the background for the actors to perform in front of.

Background refers to the visual or contextual elements behind the main focus, while set refers to the physical objects and decorations used to create that background.

Tradition.wordDefinition:
Background refers to the circumstances, events or conditions that lead up to something happening, while tradition refers to customs or practices that have been passed down through generations.

If someone is talking about a tradition, they might be referring to a holiday or celebrations that are unique to their culture or religion.

Background is applicable to personal experiences, while tradition is applicable to cultural or societal practices.

quotes.Text: My father came from a very poor background, but I was very fortunate in the sense that we were never in need. My dad was determined to make sure that we didn't want for things. He wanted to give us more opportunity than he had, a better shot at a better life.
quotes.Title: Actor
quotes.Name: Brad Pitt

quotes.Text: I have a lot of good role models in my family for things off the court - like my older sister, who's a lawyer. I don't like writing papers, but she's helped me a lot. It's nice to have an art and business background because they tie together perfectly.
quotes.Title: American Tennis Player
quotes.Name: Venus Williams

quotes.Text: When you come from a background like mine, where you're entering worlds that are so different than your own, you have to be afraid.
quotes.Title: American Judge
quotes.Name: Sonia Sotomayor

quotes.Text: Time is but the shadow of the world upon the background of Eternity.
quotes.Title: English Author
quotes.Name: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.Text: The background score plays an important role in black comedies.
quotes.Title: Indian Musician
quotes.Name: D. Imman

quotes.Text: The Mekons were kind of like the background music of my life.
quotes.Title: American Novelist
quotes.Name: Jonathan Franzen

quotes.Text: I was bred and raised in a multi-cultural music background.
quotes.Title: Chinese Musician
quotes.Name: Coco Lee

quotes.Text: The discipline of desire is the background of character.
quotes.Title: English Philosopher
quotes.Name: John Locke

quotes.Text: A background person is all I've been all my life.
quotes.Name: Randy Meisner

quotes.Text: I do come from a very humble background.
quotes.Title: American Athlete
quotes.Name: Nyjah Huston
